entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
